item.title: Bank Negara Malaysia develops mobile applications for the convenience of consumers
item.description:
The Central Bank of Malaysia, Bank Negara Malaysia, has launched three new mobile applications designed to empower consumers to make well-informed financial decisions. These applications – MyBNM, BNM MyLINK, and MyTabung – aim to keep consumers updated on financial developments, provide tools for financial planning and management, and enable them to exercise their financial rights. MyBNM serves as the official Bank Negara Malaysia mobile application, offering consumers access to the latest financial news...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bank-negara-malaysia-develops-mobile-applications-for-the-convenience-of-consumers/

item.title: BNM releases commemorative coins in honor of RTM's 70th anniversary
item.description:
Source: BNM. Detail of the silver commemorative coin. The Central Bank of Malaysia has released special coins to mark the 70th anniversary of Radio Televisyen Malaysia (RTM). RTM, established on April 1, 1946, is Malaysia’s pioneer broadcaster, introducing radio in 1946 and television on December 28, 1963. These commemorative coins are available in silver and Nordic gold. Nordic gold, a gold-free alloy, is composed of 89% copper, 5% zinc, 5% aluminum, and 1% tin...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bnm-releases-commemorative-coins-in-honor-of-rtm-s-70th-anniversary/
